Comments_List: Topics surrounding sustainable land use planning
The different concepts and considerations that go into land use planning.
Basics of land use law, state/local policy and how understanding these foundations can help build more sustainable communities.
I did feel like there was a more urban focus than rural.  But, it was interesting to learn about the intricacies of many of the aspects of land use planning.
Can complete lectures at your own pace

There are a lot of concepts that the course touches: the strength is that you can get a sense of how each topic relates to your direct interests; the weakness is that the course can only touch these topics and it is up to the student to go beyond the course.
Some of the lectures are dated.
Take this course if you are interesting in a cursory dive into land use planning.  It will give you a taste of many aspects and you can take deeper dives from there.
Useful to audit. I perhaps would've gotten more out of taking it.
